articles.title: Barbora Krejcikova wins French Open over Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova in women’s final - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Barbora Krejcikova wins French Open over Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova in women’s final
articles.content: Barbora Krejcikova won her maiden Grand Slam singles title at the French Open on Saturday, beating Russias Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova to become the first Czech woman in 40 years to conquer Roland Garro… [+2627 chars]

articles.author: AP
articles.title: Barbora Krejcikova wins maiden Grand Slam title at French Open - The Indian Express
articles.description: After beating Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova in the final, Barbora Krejcikova will now try to become the first woman in 21 years to win both the French Open singles and doubles titles in the same year.
articles.content:
Unseeded Barbora Krejcikova won her first Grand Slam title by beating Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova 6-1, 2-6, 6-4 in the French Open final Saturday.
